column1: #Text=" Korra says : " Everything you said was true .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Avatar Korra , you have taken the first step in bringing balance back to the South , and soon the whole world .
#Text=" Mako says : " You never cease to amaze me .
#Text=By the way , I 'm really sorry for being a total pain .
#Text=Things were really stressful and pretty confusing .
#Text=" Mako says : " It 's harder being the Avatar 's boyfriend .
